The speed of each bullet relative to the ground is constant at v0
Each bullet hits the target when the next bullet has already been fired
The distance between two adjacent bullets in the air is s
The time interval between firing bullets is Δt0
The speed of Cart A is v1 to the left
The speed of Cart B is v2 to the right
The relative speed of the bullet with respect to Cart B is (v0 + v1)
The distance between two adjacent bullets is (v0 + v1)Δt0
